languages.text: "Когда встает вопрос жизни и смерти — значение имеет каждое слово". {n}Навигатор обеспокоенно косится на упавшую в обморок девушку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Когда встает вопрос жизни и смерти — значение имеет каждое слово". {n}Навигатор обеспокоенно косится на упавшую в обморок девушку.{/n}

languages.text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Когда встает вопрос жизни и смерти — значение имеет каждое слово". {n}Навигатор обеспокоенно косится на упавшую в обморок девушку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}
"When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}
"When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}
"When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}

languages.text: “当涉及到生死时，每个字都至关重要。”{n}年迈的导航者关切地看了卡西娅一眼，她此刻不省人事，仿佛死了一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当涉及到生死时，每个字都至关重要。”{n}年迈的导航者关切地看了卡西娅一眼，她此刻不省人事，仿佛死了一样。{/n}

languages.text: «Cuando se trata de vida o muerte, cada palabra cuenta». {n}El Navegante mira con preocupación a Cassia, inconsciente en el suelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuando se trata de vida o muerte, cada palabra cuenta». {n}El Navegante mira con preocupación a Cassia, inconsciente en el suelo.{/n}

languages.text: 「生死にかかわる問題では、言葉ひとつひとつが重要なのだ」{n}航宙士は、意識を失って横たわるカシアに心配そうな視線を投げかける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「生死にかかわる問題では、言葉ひとつひとつが重要なのだ」{n}航宙士は、意識を失って横たわるカシアに心配そうな視線を投げかける。{/n}

languages.text: "Wenn es um Leben und Tod geht, ist jedes Wort wichtig." {n}Der Navigator blickt besorgt zu Cassia, die nun ohnmächtig auf dem Boden liegt, wie tot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es um Leben und Tod geht, ist jedes Wort wichtig." {n}Der Navigator blickt besorgt zu Cassia, die nun ohnmächtig auf dem Boden liegt, wie tot.{/n}

languages.text: « Lorsqu'il est question de vie ou de mort, chaque mot à son importance. » {n}Le navigateur lance un regard inquiet à Cassia, qui est allongée au sol, inconsciente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Lorsqu'il est question de vie ou de mort, chaque mot à son importance. » {n}Le navigateur lance un regard inquiet à Cassia, qui est allongée au sol, inconsciente.{/n}

languages.text: "Ölüm kalım meselesi söz konusuysa her kelimenin önemi vardır." {n}Rotacı, ölü gibi yatmakta olan Cassia'ya endişeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When it is a matter of life and death, every word matters." {n}The Navigator casts a concerned glance at Cassia, now lying in a dead faint.{/n}
